title: Kuro Gal ni Natta kara Shinyuu to shitemita.

synonyms: I Became a Black Gal So I Fucked My Best Friend
Kuro Gal ni Natta kara Shinyuu to Yattemita.
alternative_titles.ja: 黒ギャルになったから親友としてみた。

synopsis:
College students Shion Chihara and Rui Chihaya are childhood friends who enjoy picking up girls together. When a strange drug transforms Shion into a woman, Rui cannot resist sharing an intimate moment with him, even after learning his true identity. As they investigate Shion's new body and the events that shift him between male and female forms periodically, their relationship deepens in ways that they never before thought possible.

[Written by MAL Rewrite]
